resources.string: The number of strips that you can fit in your venue will appear here
Please enter the dimensions of your venue in meters

\t Venue Planning \n \n Create your venue layout with our venue planning tool. You need to enter the width and length of your venue, and the app will calculate how many fencing strips (pistes) can fit in there.
\t Venue Planning \n \n Position the pistes on the venue. Double click on them to change their orientation, and drag to move it across the the venue.
\t View Equipment in 3D \n\n See the way the equipment will fit in your venue using our "View AR" feature.
\t View Equipment in 3D \n\n Point the camera at an empty spot and around you and see a real size fencing piste, scoring machine, and reels.
Would you like to restart the layout?
